name: Rage of Dragons
description:
Welcome to the world of Dragons. Create a legendary journey dived into the wild land!


In the mysterious Dragon's land, you will enjoy the pleasure of slaming God and Evils; wonder in the unknown fear; become the legend of "Rage of Dragons".



## FEATURES ##
An unforgetable journey awaits you!

Real 3D gorgeous in game scenery. Raid dungeons freely, and obtain EXP in a variety of ways.



Collect Epic Heroes

You will find sorts of famous worldwide epic heroes in the game. Free gain and update them ASAP! The arisen of HEROES has just began!



Realtime Battle Arena

Dived from the 1v1 real-time combat of Showdown to the multiplayer fighting against darkness, ROD sets quantity of benefits for all competitors.



Team up with friends

Become the real warrior in every battle, team up with you friends to face all challenge with calm smile



Slam Demons, Kill Dragons

Slam demons ad kill dragons to get equipment and crafting materials in ROD. World bosses, instance bosses, the evil dragons will give you a lot of chances to level up and get rewarded. Free and Fast.



Hunt or be hunted!

Whether you played single or multiplayer together. Be awear you will have no mercy for anyone in the game. It is your own choice: Hunt or be hunted.
